project_abstract.cdata: The project would be implemented in the period 1977-82 and would comprise: (a) Construction or conversion of building, equipment and furniture for: (i) two science/technology centers, originally programmed under the First Project and serving groups of urban lower secondary schools; science rooms and technology workshops for about 20 rural lower secondary schools; and renovation of a teacher training college specializing in science, technology and agriculture; (ii) two agricultural centers and one livestock training center for junior technicians; (iii) a national management institute; (iv) offices and houses for a functional literacy program. (b) Equipment, materials, and operating expenses for the Project Unit, for a functional literacy program, and for the development and testing of new programs identified by the preinvestment study of basic education. (c) Provision of 142 man-years of specialists, fellowships and support staff.
